title: API Academy: Get and Post
description: Write an async function that "GET"s data from a Web API, and "POST"s using data from the response.

validation_fields.name: prompt
validation_fields.label: Write a function called "getAuthorAndPostBookReview" that makes a "GET" request to the "divination" Web API, chooses an author's book, and "POST"s a review for it.
